name: 梦回理想乡DreamToHometown
description:
游戏名：梦回理想乡 | Dream To Hometown

Game name：Dream To Hometown

游戏玩法：

1.鼠标点击与物体交换

2.鼠标左键点击空间拖拽 进行空间交换

3.长按鼠标右键旋转游戏视角

Game play：

1.Click to exchange with objects

2.Left click space drag to exchange space

3.Long press the right mouse button to rotate the game perspective

背景故事：泽斯基是理想乡中的一名话剧演员。他曾扮演过话剧中的探险家，因此对冒险产生了浓烈的兴趣想成为一名真正的探险家探索未知的领域。但这似乎让他忘记了自己本职的身份是名演员，使他在冒险的这条不归路上越走越远最终迷失自我。这次泽斯基在洞窟探险中迷失了回归最初的路，但泽斯基身上的口粮有限，你需要帮助泽斯基在口粮耗尽之前回到最初的洞窟出发点。最好能使他在本次冒险中回归初心找回真正的自己，回到真正的理想乡！

Background story: Zesky is a drama actor in the Ideal Village. He once played the role of an explorer in a play, so he became very interested in adventure and wanted to be a real explorer exploring unknown fields. But this seems to make him forget that he is a famous actor in his own job, which makes him go further and further on the road of no return and finally lose himself. In this cave exploration, Zesky lost his way back to the original, but his rations are limited. You need to help Zesky return to the original cave starting point before his rations are exhausted. It is better to make him return to his original intention and find his true self in this adventure, and return to the real ideal hometown!

下面是我们油管和B站账号链接，欢迎大家观看和订阅我们的频道！
